name: Tony Tough and the Night of Roasted Moths
description: What do alien abductions, a depressed town, and a purple tapir named Pentagruel have in common? Can a bumbling gumshoe make his stolen candy theory stick? Find out with the "Sherlock Gnome" of detectives, Tony Tough, and a hilarious cast of characters as he cracks the case on the most adventurous and comical night of his life!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: Don't buy this game from Steam. There's a bug which won't allow you to finish the game (read the community posts), and Steam won't refund because you have to play more than 2 hours by the time you get to the bug.
